title: emailcomposetask and html
body: emailcomposetask must have html support. Plain Text is not for professional apps today.

comments.body: Need html formatting in body also.  Ridiculous that it was omitted.
thanks a lot Anonymous. I will try.
To send html emails with any kind of attachments from a WP7 or WP8 app, you can use this component: http://www.windowsphonegeek.com/marketplace/components/livemailmessage

My application should send a text formated in columns but I have no way to manage the font of the message (to fixed spaced courier) neither include any kind of table or image. Just plain text, in default font. :-(
Fully agree with you. It is also very much needed attachments.
